name: Slugs:Ascendance
description:
Immagine a world where you can cruft hunt and fight in a forest , making your tribe.

Or go to village and settle as a farmer, managing your property , making money . The may be become artisan or enrlo in to army ,to rise , serve and may be get your village one day .

Work hard , and make others work even harder. Build it , enlarge it , make it in to castle, city or other type of settlement .

Force every one to kneel and get Emperors crown .

Eat and sleep , manage castle and vassals .

 

All of this is not implemented yet :-D .

 

But you can play some nice demo on "tower deffence".

Build your castle , enrole population to fight pillagers , set and collect taxes , LVL up and get stronger with each skill point you earn .

https://stanislavavdalyan.wixsite.com/slugascendence
